constitutionalsection.catchline: Property liable to sale on execution.
constitutionalsection.para: The rolling stock and all other movable property belonging to any railroad company or corporation in this state, shall be liable to execution and sale in the same manner as the personal property of individuals, and the legislature shall pass no law exempting any such property from execution and sale.

source.para: Transferred by Constitutional Convention, 1919-1920, art. X, sec. 2.
